methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a new ProgramDB

params.name: name
params.comment: the name of the program

params.name: consumer
params.comment: the object that is using this program.

throws.comment: if there is an error accessing the database.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a new ProgramDB

params.name: dbh
params.comment: a handle to an open program database.

params.name: openMode
params.comment:
one of:
 		READ_ONLY: the original database will not be modified
 		UPDATE: the database can be written to.
 		UPGRADE: the database is upgraded to the latest schema as it is opened.

params.name: monitor
params.comment: TaskMonitor that allows the open to be canceled.

params.name: consumer
params.comment: the object that keeping the program open.

throws.comment: if an error accessing the database occurs.
if database version does not match implementation, UPGRADE may be possible.
if instantiation is canceled by monitor

methods.name: getNamespaceManager
methods.comment: returns the namespace manager

methods.name: getCodeManager
methods.comment: Returns the CodeManager

methods.name: getTreeManager
methods.comment: Returns the TreeManager

methods.name: getDataManager
methods.comment: Returns the DataManager

methods.name: getFunctionManager
methods.comment: Returns the FunctionManager

methods.javadoc:
Returns this programs address map.
 NOTE: This method has been dropped from the Program interface to help
 discourage the use of the program's address map since bad assumptions 
 are frequently made about address keys which may not be ordered or sequential
 across an entire address space.
methods.name: getAddressMap
methods.comment:
Returns this programs address map.
 NOTE: This method has been dropped from the Program interface to help
 discourage the use of the program's address map since bad assumptions 
 are frequently made about address keys which may not be ordered or sequential
 across an entire address space.

methods.name: dataTypeChanged
methods.comment: notification the a datatype has changed

params.name: dataTypeID
params.comment: the id of the datatype that changed.

params.name: type
params.comment: the type of the change (moved, renamed, etc.)

params.name: oldValue
params.comment: the old datatype.

params.name: newValue
params.comment: the new datatype.

methods.name: dataTypeAdded
methods.comment: Notification that a datatype was added.

params.name: dataTypeID
params.comment: the id if the datatype that was added.

params.name: type
params.comment: should always be DATATYPE_ADDED

params.name: oldValue
params.comment: always null

params.name: newValue
params.comment: the datatype added.

methods.name: categoryChanged
methods.comment: Notification that a category was changed.

params.name: categoryID
params.comment: the id of the datatype that was added.

params.name: type
params.comment: the type of changed

params.name: oldValue
params.comment: old value depends on the type.

params.name: newValue
params.comment: new value depends on the type.

methods.name: categoryAdded
methods.comment: Notification that a category was added.

params.name: categoryID
params.comment: the id of the datatype that was added.

params.name: type
params.comment: the type of changed (should always be CATEGORY_ADDED)

params.name: oldValue
params.comment: always null

params.name: newValue
params.comment: new value depends on the type.

methods.name: programTreeAdded
methods.comment: Notification that a program tree was added.

params.name: id
params.comment: the id of the program tree that was added.

params.name: type
params.comment: the type of changed

params.name: oldValue
params.comment: old value is null

params.name: newValue
params.comment: new value depends the tree that was added.

methods.name: programTreeChanged
methods.comment: Notification that a program tree was changed.

params.name: id
params.comment: the id of the program tree that was changed.

params.name: type
params.comment: the type of change

params.name: oldValue
params.comment: old value depends on the type of the change

params.name: newValue
params.comment: old value depends on the type of the change

methods.name: tagChanged
methods.comment:
Notification that a FunctionTag was changed. This can be either an
 edit or a delete.

params.name: tag
params.comment: the tag that was changed.

params.name: type
params.comment: the type of change

params.name: oldValue
params.comment: old value

params.name: newValue
params.comment: new value

methods.name: tagCreated
methods.comment: Notification that a new FunctionTag was created.

params.name: tag
params.comment: the tag that was created.

params.name: type
params.comment: the type of change

methods.name: symbolChanged
methods.comment: Notification that a symbol was changed.

params.name: symbol
params.comment: the symbol that was changed.

params.name: type
params.comment: the type of change

params.name: addr
params.comment: the address of the symbol that changed

params.name: oldValue
params.comment: old value depends on the type of the change

params.name: newValue
params.comment: old value depends on the type of the change

methods.name: symbolAdded
methods.comment: Notification that a symbol was added.

params.name: symbol
params.comment: the symbol that was added.

params.name: type
params.comment: the type of change

params.name: addr
params.comment: the address of the symbol that added

params.name: oldValue
params.comment: old value depends on the type of the change

params.name: newValue
params.comment: old value depends on the type of the change

methods.name: setChanged
methods.comment:
Mark the state this Program as having changed and generate
 the event.  Any or all parameters may be null.

params.name: type
params.comment: event type

params.name: oldValue
params.comment: original value

params.name: newValue
params.comment: new value

methods.name: setChanged
methods.comment:
Mark the state this Program as having changed and generate
 the event.  Any or all parameters may be null.

params.name: type
params.comment: event type

params.name: start
params.comment: starting address that is affected by the event

params.name: end
params.comment: ending address that is affected by the event

params.name: oldValue
params.comment: original value

params.name: newValue
params.comment: new value

methods.name: setObjChanged
methods.comment:
Mark the state of a Program as having changed and generate
 the event.  Any or all parameters may be null.
 NOTE: ChangeSet data will not be updated since this a very generic
 change not related to a specific address.

params.name: type
params.comment: event type

params.name: affectedObj
params.comment: object that is the subject of the event

params.name: oldValue
params.comment:
original value or an Object that is related to
 the event

params.name: newValue
params.comment:
new value or an Object that is related to the
 the event

methods.name: setObjChanged
methods.comment:
Mark the state of a Program as having changed and generate
 the event.  Any or all parameters may be null.
 NOTE: ChangeSet data will not be updated since this a very generic
 change not related to a specific address.

params.name: type
params.comment: event type

params.name: subType
params.comment: event sub-type

params.name: affectedObj
params.comment: object that is the subject of the event

params.name: oldValue
params.comment:
original value or an Object that is related to
 the event

params.name: newValue
params.comment:
new value or an Object that is related to the
 the event

methods.name: setObjChanged
methods.comment:
Mark the state of a Program as having changed and generate
 the event.  Any or all parameters may be null.

params.name: type
params.comment: event type

params.name: addr
params.comment: program address affected

params.name: affectedObj
params.comment: object that is the subject of the event

params.name: oldValue
params.comment:
original value or an Object that is related to
 the event

params.name: newValue
params.comment:
new value or an Object that is related to the
 the event

methods.name: setObjChanged
methods.comment:
Mark the state of a Program as having changed and generate
 the event.  Any or all parameters may be null.

params.name: type
params.comment: event type

params.name: subType
params.comment: event sub-type

params.name: addr
params.comment: program address affected

params.name: affectedObj
params.comment: object that is the subject of the event

params.name: oldValue
params.comment:
original value or an Object that is related to
 the event

params.name: newValue
params.comment:
new value or an Object that is related to the
 the event

methods.name: setObjChanged
methods.comment:
Mark the state of a Program as having changed and generate
 the event.  Any or all parameters may be null.

params.name: type
params.comment: event type

params.name: addrSet
params.comment: set of program addresses affected

params.name: affectedObj
params.comment: object that is the subject of the event

params.name: oldValue
params.comment:
original value or an Object that is related to
 the event

params.name: newValue
params.comment:
new value or an Object that is related to the
 the event

methods.name: setPropertyChanged
methods.comment:
Mark the state of a Program as having changed and generate
 the DOCR_CODE_UNIT_PROPERTY_CHANGED event.

params.name: codeUnitAddr
params.comment: address of the code unit with the property change

params.name: oldValue
params.comment: old value for the property

params.name: newValue
params.comment: new value for the property

methods.name: setPropertyRangeRemoved
methods.comment:
Mark the state of a Program as having changed and generate
 the DOCR_CODE_UNIT_PROPERTY_RANGE_REMOVED event.

params.name: propertyName
params.comment: name of the property

params.name: start
params.comment: start of range of the property being removed

params.name: end
params.comment: end of the range of the property being removed

methods.name: addOverlaySpace
methods.comment: Creates a new OverlayAddressSpace with the given name and base AddressSpace

params.name: overlaySpaceName
params.comment: the name of the overlay space to create

params.name: templateSpace
params.comment: the base AddressSpace to overlay

throws.comment: if an AddressSpace already exists with the given name.
if the program is shared and not checked out exclusively.
if image base override is active

methods.name: deleteAddressRange
methods.comment: Deletes given range from the program.

params.name: startAddr
params.comment: the first address in the range.

params.name: endAddr
params.comment: the last address in the range.

params.name: monitor
params.comment: the task monitor to use while deleting information in the given range.

throws.comment: if the user cancelled the operation via the task monitor.

methods.name: moveAddressRange
methods.comment: Moves all information stored in the given range to the new location.

params.name: fromAddr
params.comment: the first address in the range to be moved.

params.name: toAddr
params.comment: the address to move to.

params.name: length
params.comment: the number of addresses to move.

params.name: monitor
params.comment: the task monitor to use while deleting information in the given range.

throws.comment: if the user cancelled the operation via the task monitor.

methods.name: setLanguage
methods.comment: Translate language

params.name: translator
params.comment: language translator, if null only re-disassembly will occur.

params.name: newCompilerSpecID
params.comment: new compiler specification which corresponds to new language, may be null.

fields.javadoc: Key version numbers which require special upgrade handling
fields.name: ANALYSIS_OPTIONS_MOVED_VERSION
fields.comment: Key version numbers which require special upgrade handling
